RATING 5.0 Hot Bagels&Deli Bagel Shop, Deli/Sandwich/Subs, Fast Food 13706 West Bell Road, Surprise (623) 556-8108 LATEST REVIEW The best deli that I ever been at. The service is quick as the speed of the sound. They have a whole variety of bagels. I go there almost every day and I order the bagel with everything and I can't get enough. The shop is very clean and also very hea... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO

Burger King Burger, Fast Food 12601 West Bell Road, Surprise (623) 583-9044 LATEST REVIEW Every single time that I have ever gone to this establishment it is the worst experience ever. The staff is really rude unable to place a correct order. I mean really, if there is not one car behind me do I seriously need to pull forward and park? BE THE FIRST TO REVIEW THIS RESTAURANT!
